continuum-skin-desc:
Provides 2 Continuum skins:
* 11 - The Modern version of MonoBook with fresh look and many usability improvements.
*  - The Continuum built as part of the WMF [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Desktop_Improvements Desktop Improvements] project.
prefs-continuum-enable-continuum-1-help: Over the next few years, we will be gradually updating the Continuum skin. Legacy Continuum will allow you to view the old version of Continuum (as of December 19). To learn more about the updates, go to our [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Reading/Web/Desktop_Improvements project page].
continuum-opt-out-tooltip: Change your settings to go back to the old look of the skin (legacy Continuum)
continuum.css: /* All CSS here will be loaded for users of the Continuum skin */
continuum.js: /* All JavaScript here will be loaded for users of the Continuum skin */
continuum-language-button-aria-label: Go to an article in another language. Available in {{PLURAL:$1|$1 language|$1 languages}}
continuum-no-language-button-aria-label: This article exist only in this language. Add the article for other languages
continuum-appearance-tooltip: Change the appearance of the page's font size, width, and color
skin-theme-description: [Experimental version, high likelihood of experiencing issues] Reduces the light emitted by device screens.
skin-theme-exclusion-notice: This page is always in light mode.
continuum-feature-custom-font-size-exclu: This page always uses small font size
continuum-feature-limited-width-exclusio: The content is as wide as possible for your browser window.
continuum-prefs-limited-width-help: Enable limited width mode for improved reading experience.
empty-language-selector-body: Page contents not supported in other languages.
continuum-toc-unpinned-popup: The table of contents has moved here.
continuum-page-tools-unpinned-popup: The tools menu has moved here.
continuum-main-menu-unpinned-popup: The main menu has moved here.
continuum-appearance-unpinned-popup: The appearance menu has moved here.
continuum-beta-preview-description: Get early access to the new reading accessibility features, such as typography improvements and dark mode.
continuum-night-mode-gadget-warning: You're using a dark mode gadget that interferes with this feature. [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-gadgets|Disable the gadget]] to use dark mode.
continuum-night-mode-issue-reporting-not: Report when dark mode colors make things difficult to read.
continuum-night-mode-issue-reporting-lin: Report an issue with dark mode
continuum-night-mode-issue-reporting-pre:
<!--
Instructions
Please describe how the dark mode colors are making Wikipedia difficult to read.
Please include the section of the article where you found the issue.
-->
'''Issue Description'''
